roleset.name: understudy
roleset.note: UNDERSTUDY-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin. Member of Vncls captain-29.8-1. (from understudy.01-v)

example.name: Regular usage
example.text: Laura Bell Bundy understudied the role of Glinda in Broadway's "Wicked" after originating the role of Amberin "Hairspray".
example.arg: the role of Glinda in Broadway's "Wicked"
after originating the role of Amber in "Hairspray".
